event.title: Retro games, arcade and music night
event.description: We'll set up some old consoles, arcades and have fun!

event.title: Welcome!
event.description: An introduction to the Hackerspace and Newline!

event.title: Talks and workshops - Schedule to be announced
event.description: Upcoming : Mitch Altman - Science is broken - or is it? - Let's go camping! - Software Defined Radio with HackRF One for beginners - DevOps: Managing the technical quality side of big projects - Scheduling (big) data pipelines - Biohacking intro - Hardware-Based Trusted Computing from an Attack/Defense Perspective - Wireless Belgium - DIY bio techniques - Kombucha is easy! - Introduction to vim - Lockpicking - Soldering with Mitch Altman - Lightning talks - more to be announced...
